about_the_game:
Exo - Winner of the Community Class Design contest!

The Prophet of the sun and moon. She embodies the celestial duality of light and darkness, inflicting freezing cold damage and burning her enemies to cinders. She can control the power of the solar system leaving behind a trail of absolute destruction.

Playstyle:

The Exo offers players a dynamic and versatile playstyle, allowing them to choose between the searing heat of the sun and the chilling embrace of the moon. Whether unleashing scorching solar flares or wielding the power of darkness to rend reality asunder, players can enjoy high quantities of projectiles and the damaging AOE might of Exo.

Recommended for:

  • Players who enjoy high-impact, visually stunning abilities that obliterate enemies.

  • Those who relish spamming powerful spells of the Fire or Cold element.

  • Whoever wants to unleash a black hole while dropping asteroids releasing tsunamis on the poor enemies being sucked in
